statistiche: 10 HP, 1 Armor, 14 STR, 8 DEX, 8 WIL, Razorsharp Tentacles (d12), Devouring Maw (d8)
descrizione: A hybrid marine creature with sharp tentacles and bioluminescent gills. Can emit lethal sound waves and swallow entire ships.

descrizione: A massive sea creature with armored scales. Can generate destructive waves, launch powerful water jets, and crush ships with its immense strength.
tecnica: Its imposing presence and control over water and waves make it a formidable adversary in aquatic environments.
critico: When critically damaged, releases a surge of primal water energy, causing a massive tidal wave that engulfs the area and damages enemies in its path, while also using the water energy to rapidly heal its own wounds.

statistiche: 2 HP, 0 Armor, 8 STR, 12 DEX, 6 WIL, Corrosive Acid Spray (d6, acid)
descrizione: A mutant insect that sprays corrosive acid. Can quickly evade and attack from various angles.

critico: When critically damaged, releases a concentrated burst of corrosive acid, creating a temporary area of hazardous terrain that damages foes who come into contact with it while also using the acidic properties to partially heal its own wounds.

statistiche: 2 HP, 0 Armor, STR 10, DEX 14, WIL 12, Antimatter Burst (d8, blast)
descrizione: Entity forged from antimatter essence. Possesses the power to annihilate anything it makes contact with.

critico: Can phase through solid objects, allowing it to move unhindered.

tecnica: They are connected by a hive mind commanded by the queen.

statistiche: 8 HP, 2 Armor, 14 STR, 10 DEX, 14 WIL, Acid Spit (d8, poison)

critico: It will have 2d6 drones in its defense if attacked directly.

statistiche: 8 HP, 3 Armor, 14 STR, 12 DEX, 10 WIL, Energy Blades (d8), Shockwave (d10, blast)
descrizione: An imposing armored warrior with an unyielding suit of armor. Can strike with energyinfused swords, generate protective shields, and charge enemies with great force.
tecnica: Its unwavering resolve and heavy armor make it a steadfast guardian on the battlefield.
critico: When critically damaged, channels residual energy into a devastating shockwave, briefly stunning and disorienting nearby foes.

statistiche: 6 HP, 3 Armor, 12 STR, 12 DEX, 10 WIL, Powerful Claws (d8), Steel Fists d6), Shockwave Strikes (d10, blast)
descrizione: Beast adorned with armored exoskeleton.
tecnica: Equipped with powerful claws for rending prey and steel fists for devastating strikes.
critico: Can unleash shockwaves by channeling the force of its blows, affecting the environment and adversaries.

statistiche: 18 HP, 3 Armor, 18 STR, 8 DEX, 8 WIL, Astral Tentacles (d10)
descrizione: Astral Leviathan is a massive, ethereal creature that seems to exist in multiple dimensions at once. It has long, otherworldly tentacles that can phase in and out of reality.
tecnica: Astral Leviathan can project itself into other dimensions, making it difficult to hit with physical attacks.
critico: On a critical hit, Astral Leviathan's tentacles can deal extra damage and phase out the target, making them momentarily unable to act.

statistiche: 6 HP, 3 Armor, 12 STR, 14 DEX, 12 WIL, Binary Sword (d8)

tecnica: Binary Warrior can take on a binary form, making it immune to physical damage and increasing its speed.
critico: On a critical hit, Binary Warrior's sword can overload the target's systems, dealing extra damage and shortcircuiting any electronic devices they may be carrying.

statistiche: 5 HP, 2 Armor, 12 STR, 10 DEX, 6 WIL, Sharp Claws (d8)
descrizione: A hybrid between human and animal, enhanced with biomechanical prosthetics. Possesses superhuman agility, sharp claws, and the ability to blend into the surrounding environment.
tecnica: Exhibits a blend of organic and mechanical traits, making it a versatile and formidable combatant.
critico: When critically damaged, deploys an emergency energy surge, temporarily enhancing its speed and strength.

statistiche: 4 HP, 1 Armor, STR 10, DEX 12, WIL 14, Claws (d6)

statistiche: 6 HP, 3 Armor, 10 STR, 12 DEX, 10 WIL, Venomous Claws (d6, poison)

tecnica: Its durable carapace and offensive capabilities make it a resilient and dangerous opponent.
critico: When critically damaged, releases a surge of regenerative energy, restoring health and enhancing its defenses temporarily.

statistiche: 4 HP, 1 Armor, 12 STR, 12 DEX, 8 WIL, Poisonous Spores (d4, blast)

statistiche: 6 HP, 1 Armor, 6 STR, 8 DEX, 8 WIL, Retractable Claws (d6), Paralyzing Howl (d4, paralyze)
descrizione: A genetically modified wolf with retractable claws and powerful muscles. Possesses advanced night vision and the ability to emit paralyzing howls.

statistiche: 10 HP, 1 Armor, 10 STR, 14 DEX, 16 WIL, Fire Blast (d8, blast), Earthwave Shock (d10, blast), Lightining Storm (d12 , blast)

statistiche: 8 HP, 1 Armor, STR 12, DEX 12, WIL 10, Sharp Claws (d6), Integrated Plasma Cannons (d12, blast)

statistiche: 6 HP, 0 Armor, 12 STR, 16 DEX, 16 WIL, Claws (d6)

statistiche: 4 HP, 1 Armor, 10 STR, 12 DEX, 8 WIL, Sharp Tentacles (d6)

statistiche: 4 HP, 1 Armor, 12 STR, 10 DEX, 8 WIL, Immobilizing Tentacles (d8), Toxic Spores (d4, blast)

statistiche: 4 HP, 1 Armor, 8 STR, 10 DEX, 6 WIL, Multicolored Laser Beams (d8)
descrizione: An alien insect that absorbs and reflects light. Capable of emitting multicolored laser beams and confusing enemies with optical illusions.

statistiche: 5 HP, 3 Armor, 14 STR, 12 DEX, 10 WIL, Rifled Arm (d8)

descrizione: A creature that is part human and part machine, with powerful claws and cannons integrated into its mechanical arms. Can move swiftly and fire penetrating projectiles.

tecnica: Able to project a powerful energy shield that protects it from harm.
critico: On a critical hit, Starfire can overload its energy shield and deal damage to all nearby enemies.

tecnica: Its cosmic origin and immense size make it a formidable and aweinspiring opponent.
critico: When critically damaged, unleashes a surge of cosmic energy, creating a localized cosmic storm that damages and disorients nearby enemies, while also using the energy to repair and regenerate its own wounds.

statistiche: 14 HP, 3 Armor, 16 STR, 8 DEX, 8 WIL, Starlight Energy Beams (d10, blast), Gravitational Anomaly (d12, blast)

tecnica: Its immense cosmic presence and ability to manipulate gravity make it a force to be reckoned with.
critico: When critically damaged, disrupts the fabric of space, creating an unstable gravitational anomaly that draws in and damages nearby enemies.

descrizione: A magnificent creature cloaked in celestial flames. Can regenerate through fire, launch solar projectiles, and create stellar explosions.
tecnica: Its connection to cosmic energies and fiery nature make it a radiant and powerful opponent.
critico: When critically damaged, combusts in a blazing inferno, releasing a burst of solar energy that engulfs the area and deals intense fire damage to enemies nearby.

tecnica: Utilizes psychowave manipulation to project astroillusions, distorting reality and influencing cognitive processes.
critico: Upon a critical success, the Star Seer momentarily exposes the target's mind to the overwhelming vastness of the universe, potentially causing a stun or disorientation due to the sheer enormity of the cosmic revelation.

tecnica: Its presence commands attention, with crackling energy radiating around its form.
critico: When critically damaged, releases a surge of electric energy, temporarily overloading nearby electronic devices.

critico: Can replicate the abilities and skills of those it mimics.

critico: Circuitry Manipulation: Proficient in altering electronic circuits to its advantage.
